sections.title: Point of Sale (POS)
sections.paragraph: Mobile ready solution built for tablet devices to perform floor/counter sales and exchanges.

panels.title: Retail Operations
listItems: Transact sales directly on floor by credit card
Lookup customers and referrers while ordering
Apply multiple discounts including coupons, promo codes and offers

panels.title: Hardware Integration
listItems: Integrates with cash drawer, card reader, wireless scanner and receipt printer
Cash drawer management and end of day reports

panels.title: Checkout Flow
listItems: New customer and new member checkout
Real-time address validation, sales tax look-up and payment
Auto-responders for order confirmation, customer and member welcome letters, and up-line notifications
